languages.text: [Прочитать девушке проповедь] "Дитя, твоя вера далека от Имперского кредо, но сейчас я приобщу тебя к истинным догматам".
[Recite a sermon to the young woman] "Child, your faith has strayed far from the Imperial Creed, but I will teach you the true dogma."
languages.original_text: [Прочитать девушке проповедь] "Дитя, твоя вера далека от Имперского кредо, но сейчас я приобщу тебя к истинным догматам".

traits.locale_text: [Recite a sermon to the young woman] "Child, your faith has strayed far from the Imperial Creed, but I will teach you the true dogma."

[Recite a sermon to the young woman] "Child, your faith has strayed far from the Imperial Creed, but I will teach you the true dogma."

languages.text: [Für die junge Frau eine Predigt rezitieren] "Kind, Euer Glaube ist weit vom Imperialen Glauben abgekommen, aber ich werde Euch das wahre Dogma lehren."
languages.original_text: [Recite a sermon to the young woman] "Child, your faith has strayed far from the Imperial Creed, but I will teach you the true dogma."

traits.locale_text: [Für die junge Frau eine Predigt rezitieren] "Kind, Euer Glaube ist weit vom Imperialen Glauben abgekommen, aber ich werde Euch das wahre Dogma lehren."

languages.text: [Gratifier la jeune femme d'un sermon] « Mon enfant, votre foi s'est par trop éloignée du Crédo Impérial, mais je me fais fort de vous enseigner le seul et unique vrai dogme. »
languages.original_text: [Recite a sermon to the young woman] "Child, your faith has strayed far from the Imperial Creed, but I will teach you the true dogma."

traits.locale_text: [Gratifier la jeune femme d'un sermon] « Mon enfant, votre foi s'est par trop éloignée du Crédo Impérial, mais je me fais fort de vous enseigner le seul et unique vrai dogme. »

languages.text: [对年轻姑娘进行布道]“孩子，你的信仰已经偏离了帝国教义，但我会教导你何为真正的信仰。”
languages.original_text: [Recite a sermon to the young woman] "Child, your faith has strayed far from the Imperial Creed, but I will teach you the true dogma."

traits.locale_text: [对年轻姑娘进行布道]“孩子，你的信仰已经偏离了帝国教义，但我会教导你何为真正的信仰。”

languages.text: [Recitar un sermón a la joven] «Hija, tu fe se ha apartado del Credo imperial, pero yo te enseñaré el verdadero dogma».
languages.original_text: [Recite a sermon to the young woman] "Child, your faith has strayed far from the Imperial Creed, but I will teach you the true dogma."

traits.locale_text: [Recitar un sermón a la joven] «Hija, tu fe se ha apartado del Credo imperial, pero yo te enseñaré el verdadero dogma».

languages.text: [若い女性に説教をする]「君の信仰は帝国信条集から大きく逸れている。{mf|俺|私}が真の教義を教えてあげよう」
languages.original_text: [Recite a sermon to the young woman] "Child, your faith has strayed far from the Imperial Creed, but I will teach you the true dogma."

traits.locale_text: [若い女性に説教をする]「君の信仰は帝国信条集から大きく逸れている。{mf|俺|私}が真の教義を教えてあげよう」

languages.text: [Genç kadına vaaz ver] "Çocuğum, inancın İmparatorluk İtikadı'ndan hayli uzaklaşmış ancak ben sana gerçek dogmayı öğreteceğim."
languages.original_text: [Recite a sermon to the young woman] "Child, your faith has strayed far from the Imperial Creed, but I will teach you the true dogma."
